entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Why are the States still responsible for individual Covid-19 response plans?  Where is the federal government leadership?  Non-existent national strategy has been devastating to Americans
